description: Try our easy to follow Split Pea, Tomato & Speck Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Split Pea, Tomato & Speck Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove rind from speck. Cut speck into 1cm-thick strips. Heat oil in a large saucepan and fry speck over medium heat for 5-8 minutes, stirring often, or until browned and starting to crisp. Drain on paper towel.
Remove all but 2 tbs oil from saucepan. Add onion, leek, celery and carrot and cook for 5 minutes. Add garlic and potato and cook for a further 3 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, stock and split peas. Bring to the boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes or until peas are soft. Season to taste.
Pour soup into bowls, top with speck and parsley and serve with bread.
